title: "Automated detection of the head-twitch response using wavelet scalograms and a deep convolutional neural network"
excerpt: "Hallucinogens induce the head-twitch response (HTR), a rapid reciprocal head movement, in mice. Although head twitches are usually identified by direct observation, they can also be assessed using a head-mounted magnet and a magnetometer."
